page.title: 20GOLF EDINBURGH & credits
page.content:
There are 6 courses around the area with 4 of them private.The 2 public courses are next to each other and don't open on Sundays.For a challenge try the Braids Summer 1 Course - it has two par 5 holes and is well equipped with steep hills and gorse bushes.In winter,the public courses combine into one course to save the greens and fairways.The private courses are Liberton, Prestonfield, Craigmillar Park, and Mortonhall.
*******ALL THIS WAS WRITTEN BY******* {6 P7 PUPILS FROM PRESTONFIELD PS AND {MRS BROWN}*{MISS JOHNSTON P4 CLASS {FROM SOUTH MORNINGSIDE PS}*{FIRST YEAR {ST MARGARETS WITH MRS SHEPHERD}* {COMPILED BY THIRD YEAR MATHS AND {COMPUTER PUPILS OF LIBERTON HS WITH MR {JONES AND MR BALFOUR.
